Text.Page: As Rhodos and <PCNAME> confronted Dakuryon, he summoned Zolyn, now a demokron, to protect him. Paesyn tried to talk her down, but the archdevan magic proved too strong and she slew Paesyn. <PCNAME> battled Zolyn while Rhodos attacked Dakuryon. <PCNAME> ended Zolyn's dark existence while Dakuryon escaped.

Did you hear that? Someone is fighting!

Hold on, Zolyn! We'll save you!

Such senseless tragedy.

I grieve for your little friends, . Dakuryon will pay for their deaths.

Run, you coward! We will never stop seeking you!
